title: Finally, a Met Gala Where Men Understood the Assignment
description: Every time the First Monday in May rolls around, it's pretty much a given that the majority of the male attendees arriving in the same black tuxedo they've been wearing on repeat for awards season. No judgement here — after all, a well-fitted suit is timeless — but with this ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
categories: Metropolitan Museum of Art Costume Institute
